column2: Many to many association and Goal as a association class including integer goals attribute

Poll 3:W6-3 UML Class: A class is divided into which of these compartments ?
What is multiplicity for an association?
column2: The multiplicity at the target class end of an association is the number of instances that can be associated with a single instance of source class
